website_summaries.verdict: Long-lasting high-quality candle packed into an attractive tin.
pros: The three-wick candle burns for up to 75 hours and smells of fragrant citrus
The candle doesn’t produce smoke, so it’s safe to use indoors
The sturdy tin contains the soy wax for a drip-free burn
cons: Some complaints of wicks not staying lit

customer_reviews.title: Works very well indoors.
customer_reviews.text: There are three different wicks in the round holder. I use only one at a time and the next time I light it I go after the wick with the most soy left to burn. Works perfectly for the mosquitoes I have had come from who knows where!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was bigger but...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Seems to do it’s job well and I love the colors and design on the container. Just wish it was much bigger so I could use it longer.
customer_reviews.author: Phaithe Reyes-Leonti

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: great product!! This candle smells great, I really like the candle holder and I will keep it once the candle burns down. The packaging is beautiful and it's evident that this is a very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but melted
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful holder, but the wax completely melted from just sitting outside. It does get into the 90’s during the day, but 60’s at night when we would use it and it’s all liquid and won’t light. Not sure if others have the same issue; I’ve never seen a Citrinella candle do that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: We had a really bad bout of mosquitoes in the LA area this past summer. I have developed an allergy to their bites, so I was doing everything I could to keep them away! I love that this candle looks so nice and actually made a great centerpiece on our living room table. I lit it throughout the summer in our home to repel the mosquitos from coming inside. The smell is light and not overbearing. It seemed to do the job along with some other measures (bug spray, bug lotion, and repellant band), and it lasted a long time.
customer_reviews.author: izzy

customer_reviews.title: Effective. Great presentation.
customer_reviews.text: Effective deterrent to critters on a medium sized balcony. Clean scent in a lovely container. Will save colorful container for whatever after candle gone.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY J ELLINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Beautiful, and It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! The 3 pack is certainly worth it. I used this inside and not only does it smell good it keeps the flies and mosquitos from coming in when I open my window or patio which is so crucial for NYC quarantine right now. Mine did not come damaged and it burned completely evenly. I’m now buying the 3 pack.
customer_reviews.author: N. Coffie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful customer service and seller. Product arrived dented. The seller immediately refunded me and sent me a replacement. The smell is amazing and the tint beautiful. It makes for a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god!It's really beyond my imagination.I didn't think that the candle would be so beautiful and exquisite,which is different from many of the ones I bought before.Moreover,I have to share my feelings carefully.It has to be said that the effect is really special.It can disperse mosquitoes and enjoy the outdoor time at night.
customer_reviews.author: Alexi A Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Decorative candle. No overwhelming citronella scent
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, decorative tin. The scent is light, doesn’t emit a strong citronella. I usually stay away from citronella scents because it gives me a headache. Not with this candle! I burn the candle indoors with the glass sliding door open, and screen door closed to allow cool air to come in my living room without the bugs. Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, smells nice but wish it worked better than it does in repelling the mosquitos.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R.

customer_reviews.title: It's worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest.I really like this scented candle.It's very delicate and compact,and it's easy to carry anywhere.One of my favorite effects is that it can disperse mosquitoes.Even if you are camping in the wild,you don't have to worry about being bitten by many mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: George A Simmler

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the different feeling that this kind of incense candle brings to me.Its taste is very special and very relaxing.And it can be used to effectively disperse mosquitoes,I really hate mosquitoes,it really makes me feel bad.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Sopoco

customer_reviews.title: Very great product
customer_reviews.text: On hot California summer nights,there are always lots of mosquitoes.I ordered this aromatherapy and it felt very useful.At least it's helpful to dispel mosquitoes.it's small and delicate,and it won't take up too much space anywhere.All in all,I like this fragrance very much.
customer_reviews.author: Kingsley W Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be lasting a long time, I’ve lit it many times and it’s still almost full. Works to keep flies away too. Super cute container.
customer_reviews.author: C. Klemetsen

customer_reviews.title: Not regret to buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to share my experience.First of all,we must give the best five-star praise.I love the taste of it,and its shell is made of iron,so it's not easy to break like glass.You can put it in the living room and even outdoors.California needs it in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Tamaura

customer_reviews.title: Wind will blow it out
customer_reviews.text: Nice candle but poorly designed. If you want to use it outside (as people typically do with citronella candles) even the slightest wind will blow it out because the sides don't come up above the flame. I still use it, but I have to put it in a pot so it doesn't get blown out.
customer_reviews.author: cmf

customer_reviews.title: My best like product
customer_reviews.text: For family camping,I think it is very necessary to prepare aromatherapy candle.Its smell can create a state of complete relaxation,mainly to disperse mosquitoes.I really like its exquisite appearance and operation.Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B Churchward

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied shopping
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this candle is really good.Its fragrance is very attractive. It is a fresh flavor belonging to nature.Moreover,it can effectively disperse harmful mosquitoes.This is my most real feeling after using it for a week.Believe me,try to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Burns unevenly
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even burn half of it before it was unusable because the wicks were flimsy and burned unevenly.
customer_reviews.author: JPorter

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The appearance of this box of candles is very delicate and fashionable. It is made from soybean oil. It is harmless to people or pets.And its one three design is very suitable as a gift. Its scent is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be packed better
customer_reviews.text: Received damaged, can is all dented in, I can’t even close the lid. Not a complete lost I guess. But for the price it is worth returning. Thet
customer_reviews.author: Bloozier

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking porch candle
customer_reviews.text: It's a candle and does what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Allen

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and has a very pretty tin. The colors and design of the tin are prettier than expected! Smaller than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: becky garthwaite

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: This product wouldn't chase off anything. I've lit it and lit it, to no avail. The mosquitos just linger around as if they live there. I do not recommend this product - could be it hasn't got enough citronella in it, but it just doesn't work!
customer_reviews.author: AReview4U

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty container!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty container the candle came in. I believe it does its job pretty well. The smell is not overbearing and it helps keep the bugs away. What more could you ask for? I would buy this candle again!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This candle is beautiful! I love the design. It’s a good size and lasts a long time too. I’ll definitely be buying more for friends!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Boom

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent but the candle didn’t last long and the wicks were to short
customer_reviews.author: karen foster

customer_reviews.title: Love this stylish tin
customer_reviews.text: Love this stylish tin, looks more like an art! A big size can last long hours. I tried several times, smell fine, I will use it to repel mosquitos in summer.
customer_reviews.author: lucas

customer_reviews.title: It works and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and lasts a long time! Great value for the money. And it works!
customer_reviews.author: GCM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I can leave them outside covered and they don't get all nasty. Have to watch the heat though.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S Imbler

customer_reviews.title: I like that this is in a pretty tin and helps ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is in a pretty tin and helps keep the bugs away. Great citronella for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Looks perfect on the deck, smells nice and keeps bugs away! Ordered one for a gift too. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Anne DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic candle and lovely design
customer_reviews.text: Great candle! Nice to have a citronella candle that looks lovely on the patio. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Quick

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, looks nice, burns for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does, good size, cute looking. Exactly what I was looking for. Seems to keep the mosquitos away.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice packaging, intense fragrance. Should be effective to keep our porch mosquito free!
customer_reviews.author: MIS

customer_reviews.title: but this seller made everything right for me and I do indeed love this candlE
customer_reviews.text: There was a mistake with my order the first time around, but this seller made everything right for me and I do indeed love this candlE! Pleasant smell and really does keep the bugs away. Thank you for replacing this for me ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty citronella candle, mosquitos dislike fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: Using outside to deter mosquitos and other bugs. Attractive cannister with watertight lid. I leave outside on picnic table to light up when bugs are bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: sari

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Presentation but Lacking....
customer_reviews.text: Tin is beautiful tin but I don't really notice much of a scent. I had trouble lighting the wicks as they kept going out. Wouldn't re-order .
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Alterman

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Candle had several dents and lid would not properly close. The item was well packaged in the box so it must have broken before it got picked for delivery
customer_reviews.author: David Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: but it's a pretty candle i guess
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it actually keeps away any mosquitoes, but it's a pretty candle i guess?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stay lit outside sides should be higher than the wicks
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great candles in beautiful containers, they smell and work great!
customer_reviews.author: sports geek

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wick is too short and the wax just ends up covering it. Only two are now burning. I was sent a free replacement without a message so I am assuming it is from the seller? So I am bumping up my rating a few stars for good customer service. Hopefully this one will burn better!
customer_reviews.author: aghstisbrn

customer_reviews.title: Obviously not an outside candle
customer_reviews.text: Kept this candle outside on our patio table then when I went to use it water must have gotten in it, even though it had it's cover on. The whole candle was destroyed! Poured out like soup. Will never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Areial

customer_reviews.title: This candle was very pretty but the tin came dented and the third wick ...
customer_reviews.text: This candle was very pretty but the tin came dented and the third wick wouldn't light after about the second or third dime burning it. Always kept it out of the rain. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this product in the future.
customer_reviews.text: Product is subpar the candle wax did not repell any mosquitoes Plus the candle wicks do not burn in synchronicity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it's a good candle otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how much this will actually keep mosquitos away, but it's a good candle otherwise. Looks and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Kolundzija

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and effective
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep away flying insects on my balcony. I even ate dinner out here and no little visitors with wings! Beautiful soft citronella scent. I will probably buy 2 more to get through the summer. Gorgeous tin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy sharon

customer_reviews.title: A candle worth buying
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tired to buy aromatherapy candles,I used to use air fresheners at home.But I don think the fragrance is lasting.My friend gave me a pair of aromatherapy candles.Later,I liked to use them very much,and this time I finally bought my favorite scented candles. I feel very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharel C Fertig

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this candle on my table and it definitely keeps all mosquitos away, great candle.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Perron

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t
customer_reviews.text: Presentable? Yes. Scent? Great. Does it work? No. Couldn’t even find the wick after one use.
customer_reviews.author: am24

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smelling but did zero against mosquitos
customer_reviews.text: The candles don't look that nice and, sadly, don't work to repel mosquitos (which are particularly vicious this summer).
customer_reviews.author: DLosangeles

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Product Description
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because an image in the product description said it was a 3-pack. That is not true - there are three wicks (which it also said) but a three pack with a 75 hour burn time each is very different from a three wick candle. I would not have bought this product if I knew it was just one candle. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan G. Weston

customer_reviews.title: Meh, didn’t really work.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, smells a bit strong, not too overpowering though, but I think it was actually attracting more gnats!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: They don't work.
customer_reviews.text: These smell nice. That's it. They don't do a thing to help if you're in an open area or there's even a slight breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe T. Jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: Just purchased a second candle
customer_reviews.text: These candles work great at keeping little biting bugs away. The scent is pleasant and the candle it's self lasted though many long hours of burning.
customer_reviews.author: Just1ofTheGirls

customer_reviews.title: smells great
customer_reviews.text: beautiful tin except for the writing on top, looks good, smells awesome
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito repellent
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and psychedelic pattern. I put this fragrance in the living room downstairs,so that it can expel insects by the way. Every time a guest comes to my house,they will always be bitten by my family's mosquitoes. I am also embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa M Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but worth it; worked better and cleaner burn, better smell and look than other citronella candles I've used camping over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: great candle and doesnt smell too strong
customer_reviews.text: this worked great! love how its all natural, looks pretty and did the job. I placed this on the picnic table and all the bugs scurried away.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Happier and sweeter
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I wanted a new taste in my room which made me feel happier and sweeter. This helps improve my quality of live.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Practical and charming
customer_reviews.text: It is no harmful to the air when it's lighted. After using it, I can totally enjoy the peaceful night. It lasts for a long time to use up. Indeed smokeless.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Inglis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pattern.
customer_reviews.text: Love it and gives off great smell. beautiful pattern. Check the size to make sure it is what you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie55

customer_reviews.title: Great Candle!
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit smaller than I thought, but it does the trick :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen Avery

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying a ugly cheap one
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay lit. The wax pools to one area. Only one wick seems to stay lit. Better off buying a ugly cheap one. We even tried to dig wax off of over wicks.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Metzler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I put it on the edge of the washbasin in the toilet, fragrant. I really like its taste. Faint and very comfortable. Recommended purchase. The smell is good.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique R Miera

customer_reviews.title: Quite joyful by being placed in the house
customer_reviews.text: After I have acquired the link of this candle from my neighbors, I am sure that it's pretty useful and comfortable to be kindled in the room. It create a quieter and cozy environment for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Newsted

customer_reviews.title: They smell so good!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they look and smell. I use them outside but would even use them inside.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Cute and effective
customer_reviews.text: Love that there’s a candle that looks cute and works
customer_reviews.author: Yads Witschi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this citronella candle! It's really big. We use it indoors and out. Really helps with mosquitos.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cook

customer_reviews.title: Cute candle
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute product. Smell good,I put it in my living room. Relaxing during at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Tin is smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Tin is smaller than I expected, but beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth C.

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected pleasure
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case! Great customer service!!! Exactly as shown. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: atequila

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant surprise when opening
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy with this purchase. I ordered 2 of these candles because of their cute tins. They arrived yesterday with wax covering the outside of the tins, making it an unpleasant experience to receive these in the mail. I was really looking forward to this order, not for the cleanup necessary prior to using and displaying these candles in my home. It was quite gross to have citronella wax on my hands when opening the package. I’m also disappointed that the lids seem to slip off and not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice holder, works well outdoors
customer_reviews.text: nice holder , works well outdoors , hardy for outdoor weather
customer_reviews.author: Jean P.

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst "citronella" candle I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this candle has so many high reviews. Not only does this candle have ZERO citronella scent, I am being bitten to death as I type this review. This is the worst "citronella" candle I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice candle but it didn't chase any bugs away in my bedroom. I'm still getting bit.
customer_reviews.author: Suivez Moi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent, beautiful tin, but my candle came without a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty and smells nice but cover was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Had to return item. Really pretty and smells nice but cover was damaged. I believe it's because it was in a padded envelope instead of a box.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Blew out so easily that I can't even use
customer_reviews.text: What's the point of an outdoor candle if it can't handle even the smallest amount of wind! Blew out so easily that I can't even use it
customer_reviews.author: Meghan L Gerber

product_meta.title: LA JOLIE MUSE Citronella Candle Scented Soy Wax 3 Wick Tin, 26-30 Hour Burn, Outdoor and Indoor
feature_bullets: 【Natural Citronella Oil】Infused with the oil of the citronella plant, this classic scent combines a top note of green citrus with a bottom note of fresh clean fragrance.

【Outdoor and Indoor Use】Place citronella candle in your backyard, patio dining, gardening, picnics, campsite, family reunions inside or outside your home to prevent hazards and enjoy a peaceful night.

【Smokeless & Protection】This citronella scented candles is smokeless and efficiently protects your home from being engulfed in harmful fumes. Its drip less feature ensures clean burning and spotless surroundings.
【BURN CLEAN & LAST LONG】Burn Hour: 26-30 hours. This candle is made with naturally biodegradable and Eco-friendly pure soy wax.
【High End Tin Candle Decor】Van Gogh’s painting style tin candle makes a beautiful centerpiece, keeping it at any place inside or outside your home to start an eye-catching conversation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars546 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
